Uses of Package
snakes.game

  • Classes in snakes.game used by snakes.game 
    Class and Description
    AudioFilePlayer
    This is a class which enables the input/output and control of a particular audio file chosen.
    AudioFileSkeleton
    This is an abstract class which provides a skeleton for the AudioFilePlayer class.
    HS
    The high score class is a generic class which stores a name and a number representing the player and the score the player has, respectively.
    Model
    Adhering to the MVC software architecture, this is the model; the model class separates the logic of a program from the rest of the user interface.
    RowCol
    Creates a simple Row and column coordinates object, which handles Cartesian coordinates on a 2D plane.
    Snake
    This class take care of everything related to the snake itself.
    View
    A view for the snake puzzle game.
